summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of Navy View Place, First Avenue Northwest, Greenwood Avenue, and North Forty-second Street, across Terrace Hill Addition, an unrecorded plat, lying in the North one-half (N. 1/2) of the Northeast Quarter (N.E. 1/4) of the Southeast Quarter (S.E. 1/4) of the Northeast Quarter (N.E. 1/4) of Section Thirteen (13), Township Twenty-five North (25 N.), Range Three (3) East, W. M.; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing for the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
